page.title: 13LAMLASH PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: The building of Lamlash Primary School was completed in 1981 and now serves as one of the seven primary schools on the island.The attendance is made up of 97 pupils and 4 teachers. The building is 1 storey semi- open plan,and due to the architectural work which was put into its design, it won an award. The pupils come from as far as three miles away and this means that local buses and taxi services have to be provided for the pupils. Before the building was completed the pupils were situated in some of the high school huts,being separated from each other considerably.Now with their semi-open classrooms all joined together teaching is much easier.
